comments.author: jgilbert@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jgilbert@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: For INPUT_FORMAT_HOSTARGB, during encoding, the output is converted to RGB or RGBA based on the output bpp setting, which is acceptable. But, when encoding with INPUT_FORMAT_RGBA, we down-convert to RGB unconditionally.
comments.text: For INPUT_FORMAT_HOSTARGB, during encoding, the output is converted to RGB or RGBA based on the output bpp setting, which is acceptable. But, when encoding with INPUT_FORMAT_RGBA, we down-convert to RGB unconditionally.

Created attachment 583968
Allow for encoding RGBA BMPs from INPUT_FORMAT_RGBA

Try run:
https://tbpl.mozilla.org/?tree=Try&rev=ed4b016c13ce
